scripts.railway:build: echo 'RAILWAY BUILD STARTING...' && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' medusa build && echo 'RAILWAY BUILD COMPLETED' && if [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo 'Copying admin build from .medusa/client -> .medusa/admin...'; rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -a .medusa/client/. .medusa/admin/; fi && echo 'Build artifacts:' && ls -la .medusa || true && find .medusa -maxdepth 2 -type f -name index.html -print || true
scripts.railway:start: npm run ensure-admin-build && npm run db:migrate && medusa start -p $PORT
scripts.ensure-admin-build: set -e; echo 'Ensuring admin build...'; if [ -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo 'Admin build present at .medusa/admin'; elif [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ]; then echo 'Found build at .medusa/client, copying to .medusa/admin...'; rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -a .medusa/client/. .medusa/admin/; else echo 'No admin build found. Building now...'; NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' medusa build; fi; if [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ] && [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ]; then echo 'Post-build: copying client -> admin...'; rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -a .medusa/client/. .medusa/admin/; fi; if [ -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo 'Admin build ready.'; else echo 'ERROR: Admin index.html still missing after build.' >&2; find . -maxdepth 3 -type f -name index.html 2>/dev/null | sed 's|^|found: |'; exit 1; fi
scripts.fix-admin-path: sh -c 'if [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo "Copying admin build from .medusa/client -> .medusa/admin"; rm -rf .medusa/admin && mkdir -p .medusa/admin && cp -R .medusa/client/* .medusa/admin/ && echo "Copy complete"; else echo "No copy needed (either admin exists or client missing)"; fi'
